trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Reno
There were no other sightings in Reno on or around July 18th 2009
Summary: 3-14 points of dancing white lights visible for ~45 minutes
divs: Sighting DetailsDuring a walk around Virginia Lake, in Reno, the two of us sat on a park bench and looked SE over the North tower of the Peppermill casino and saw a group of white lights (star point) varying between 3 and ~14 (mostly ~10) "dancing" in the eastern sky just under Saturn for at least 30 minutes (estimate 40-50 minutes). The lights each lasted for several seconds to several minutes and moved in smooth arcing patterns erratically back and forth within a a fist sized (at arms length) area of the sky. Toward the end a flashing light on a straight trajectory (probable airplane) approached the area and flew through it. During the approach the lights diminished to just one, then as the plane disappeared 2 more lights appeared, the 3 "danced", as had the previous larger group, and over ~ 5 minutes and then disappeared one by one. No further activity was noted for several minutes and we walked the 3 blocks home and entered this report. During this episode a couple (man and woman) walked by and were questioned whether they saw the lights as well. They acknowledged seeing them.
